name: Adventurer's Bandana
description:
After a character uses a Normal Attack: Heal self for 1 HP. (Max 3 times per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

storytext: "All the secrets of the stars and the abyss await discovery by mere mortals."
